  • MALAYSIAN COFFEE JOINT COMES UNDER FIRE AFTER 'MOCKING' FIVE SEN SHORT-CHANGING CLAIMS BY CUSTOMERS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2022/10/02/malaysian-coffee-joint-comes-under-fire-after-mocking-five-sen-short-changing-claims-by-customers/31207

    10/02/2022, 12:35

    64.52% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 2 — It may have only been a five-sen change for some, but local coffee chain retailer ZUS Coffee has come under social media users for their dismissive response

    He was surprised when the cashier told him that they were out of five sen coins and proceeded to only give him a 20 sen change instead — five sen short of the change he should have received

    Fdaus then responded to the cashier saying that he should’ve received 30 sen instead of 20 sen as the coffee shop was the one who was short on change

    “No, I’m not trying to be fussy, but the issue here is not about the five sen, 50 sen or RM50 value — it’s more on the gentleman principle between a seller and a customer

    “Imagine if I paid RM11.70 for the RM11.75 coffee and just simply said sorry and told you that I’m five sen short, how would you feel?” Fdaus wrote in the post

    The cashier then proceeded to give him an additional 10 sen

    Following Fdaus’ post, ZUS Coffee chief operating officer Venon Tian apologised for the incident and released a detailed statement regarding the five sen fiasco on ZUS Coffee’s social media yesterday after conducting an immediate investigation

    Prior to the statement, on September 30, ZUS Coffee had acknowledged Fdaus’s post and had introduced a new 75 sen off voucher code for the inconveniences they caused

    How many times you didn’t return the 5 sen to any customers? And yet you still had the audacity to mock us with the 75 sen token

    “I am not that good in English, but writing “a mere five sen” for me is just like sorry but not sorry

    Like saying five sen is not that important

    ['five', 'sen', 'change', 'coffee', 'user']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 2 — It may have only been a five-sen change for some, but local coffee chain retailer ZUS Coffee has come under social media users for their dismissive response

    He was surprised when the cashier told him that they were out of five sen coins and proceeded to only give him a 20 sen change instead — five sen short of the change he should have received

    Fdaus then responded to the cashier saying that he should’ve received 30 sen instead of 20 sen as the coffee shop was the one who was short on change

    “No, I’m not trying to be fussy, but the issue here is not about the five sen, 50 sen or RM50 value — it’s more on the gentleman principle between a seller and a customer

    Prior to the statement, on September 30, ZUS Coffee had acknowledged Fdaus’s post and had introduced a new 75 sen off voucher code for the inconveniences they caused

  • UKRAINE RECLAIMS FULL CONTROL FROM RUSSIA OF LOGISTICS HUB, ASSERTS FURTHER GAINS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/10/02/ukraine-celebrates-capturing-key-town-putin-ally-mulls-possible-nuclear-response

    10/02/2022, 12:33

    69.23% Shortened!

    Sunday, 02 Oct 2022

    Ukraine forces have liberated the small Arkhanhelske and Myrolyubivka settlements in the Kherson region as well, he said

    Ukraine's Interfax agency reported that according to Serhiy Cherevatyi, spokesman for the Ukrainian Eastern Group of Forces, Ukraine's forces recaptured Torske, a small village in the Donetsk region, about 15 kilometres (9 miles) east of the now liberated Lyman

    Russia's defence ministry said on Saturday that it was pulling troops out of the Lyman area "in connection with the creation of a threat of encirclement"

    It did not mention Lyman in its daily update on fighting in Ukraine on Sunday, although it said Russian forces had destroyed seven artillery and missile depots in the Ukrainian regions of Kharkiv, Zaporizhzhia, Mykolaiv and Donetsk

    Zelenskiy said the abduction of the director-general of Ukraine's Russian-occupied Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant is an act of Russian terror

    The Ukrainian military said in its evening statement on Sunday that its forces had repelled Russian advances in several areas - particularly in Donetsk region near Bakhmut and Spirne, just inside Donetsk region near Lysychansk, a major centre in neighbouring Luhansk region

    Russian forces had captured Lyman from Ukraine in May and had been using it as a logistics and transport hub for its operations in the north of the Donetsk region

    Its recapture by Ukrainian troops is Russia's largest battlefield loss since Ukraine's lightning counteroffensive in the northeastern Kharkiv region in September

    Russia had 5,000 to 5,500 troops in the town before the Ukrainian attack, a Ukrainian military spokesman said on Saturday

    Zelenskiy said on Friday that peace talks with Russia while Putin was still president would be impossible

    "We are ready for a dialogue with Russia, but with another president of Russia," he said

    ['russia', 'ukraine', 'lyman', 'region', 'russian']

    "We are ready for a dialogue with Russia, but with another president of Russia," he said

  • UKRAINE CELEBRATES RECAPTURING KEY TOWN, PUTIN ALLY RAISES NUCLEAR JITTERS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/10/02/ukraine-celebrates-capturing-key-town-putin-ally-mulls-possible-nuclear-response

    10/02/2022, 12:03

    74.42% Shortened!

    The capture on Saturday came just a day after Putin proclaimed the annexation of nearly a fifth of Ukraine - including Donetsk, where Lyman is located - and placed the regions under Russia's nuclear umbrella

    liberated and took control of the settlement of Lyman, Donetsk region," one of the soldiers says

    Lyman had fallen in May to Russian forces, which had used it as a logistics and transport hub for its operations in the north of the Donetsk region

    Its capture is Ukraine's biggest battlefield gain since the lightning counteroffensive in the northeastern Kharkiv region last month

    Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said Lyman's capture would create new problems for Russia's military

    So it presents a sort of a dilemma for the Russians going forward." Austin did not say whether he thought Ukraine's capture of Lyman might prompt Russian escalation, although U.S

    officials have widely denounced Russia's nuclear rhetoric in recent days and President Joe Biden has publicly urged Putin not to use nuclear weapons

    Ukraine's successes have infuriated Putin's allies such as Ramzan Kadyrov, the leader of Russia's southern Chechnya region

    LOGISTICS HUB Serhii Cherevatyi, spokesperson for Ukraine's eastern forces, said before the capture that Russia had 5,000 to 5,500 troops at Lyman but the number encircled could be lower

    "The liberation of this city in the Donetsk region is one of the key factors for the further de-occupation of the Luhansk region," Gaidai wrote on the Telegram messaging app on Sunday

    The areas Putin claimed as Russian - the Donbas regions of Donetsk and Luhansk and the southern regions of Kherson and Zaporizhzhia - form a swath of territory equal to about 18% of Ukraine's total surface land area

    ['russia', 'ukraine', 'lyman', 'region', 'say']

  • AT LEAST 129 DEAD AFTER VIOLENCE AT FOOTBALL MATCH IN INDONESIA

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/sports/2022/10/02/at-least-129-dead-after-violence-at-football-match-in-indonesia/31185

    10/02/2022, 11:49

    71.79% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise MALANG, Oct 2 — At least 129 people died at an Indonesian football stadium riot in which thousands of angry home fans invaded the pitch and police responded with tear gas that triggered a stampede, authorities said Sunday

    I don’t know what the issue was, they suddenly fired tear gas

    “I deeply regret this tragedy and I hope this football tragedy will be the last in our country,” Widodo said

    Images taken from inside the stadium during the stampede showed police firing huge amounts of tear gas and people clambering over fences

    People were carrying injured spectators through the chaos

    The stadium holds 42,000 people and authorities said it was a sell-out

    Police said 3,000 people stormed the pitch

    Before Widodo’s announcement, the Football Association of Indonesia (PSSI) suspended football matches of Indonesia’s top league, BRI Liga 1, for one week

    The Kanjuruhan stadium in Malang is not included in that list

    Other stadium disasters include a 1989 crush in the stands at Britain’s Hillsborough Stadium, which led to the deaths of 97 Liverpool fans, and the 2012 Port Said stadium tragedy in Egypt where 74 people died in clashes

    In 1964, 320 people were killed and more than 1,000 injured during a stampede at a Peru-Argentina Olympic qualifier at Lima’s National Stadium

    ['people', 'football', 'stadium', 'police', 'tear']

  • JURGEN KLOPP ADMITS HE HAS A LIVERPOOL PROBLEM HE 'CANNOT IGNORE'

    https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/jurgen-klopp-admits-liverpool-problem-25156146

    10/02/2022, 10:49

    74.51% Shortened!

    “When we play Brentford, you watch them and they play football against everyone

    I’m not even sure if today was a slow start, it was just our gaps in the areas where they want to play were too big

    Then you saw the difference in the game

    “Score 2-2, score 3-2

    I am guilty as well, I knew we had to work through it

    It is a moment we have to keep going through it together

    “Momentum with the late goal, late winner, we could have taken a lot of things into the next game but unfortunately we didn’t play

    It’s how it always is

    “That’s only explained by not being confident at the moment

    We want to do much better, we want more points, we want to be in a different area in the table

    They do really well

    They are outstanding in the moment

    It is not an easy game but we will give it a try.” AD NEXT

  • MAN UNITED'S ANTONY IS LIVING IN PAUL POGBA'S £3M MANSION, WITH DIAMOND STAIRS AND CUSTOM POOL TABLE

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11270855/Man-Uniteds-Antony-living-Paul-Pogbas-3m-mansion-diamond-stairs-custom-pool-table.html

    42.11% Shortened!

    Meanwhile, the Brazilian 22-year-old Antony joined the club late in the transfer window for £85.5m from Ajax

    However, it seems there was a crossover in their paths after all - because Antony is living in Pogba's old five-bedroom mansion, about 30 minutes from Manchester city centre

    Antony has revealed that his new house is the mansion of former Man United player Paul Pogba Pogba left United this summer at the end of his contract, and subsequently joined Juventus The residence is complete with an eye-catching set of diamond encrusted stairs, and a customised pool table on the first floor with the initials 'PP' on it

    It was Pogba's house, there's the P of his stuff on the table

    'In the last call-up, we played a lot of UNO, I won too', Antony joked

    Meanwhile, the Brazilian 22-year-old Antony joined the club late in the transfer window for £85.5m from Ajax

    However, it seems there was a crossover in their paths after all - because Antony is living in Pogba's old five-bedroom mansion, about 30 minutes from Manchester city centre

    Antony has revealed that his new house is the mansion of former Man United player Paul Pogba Pogba left United this summer at the end of his contract, and subsequently joined Juventus The residence is complete with an eye-catching set of diamond encrusted stairs, and a customised pool table on the first floor with the initials 'PP' on it

    It was Pogba's house, there's the P of his stuff on the table

    'In the last call-up, we played a lot of UNO, I won too', Antony joked

    By posting your comment you agree to our house rules

    Do you want to automatically post your MailOnline comments to your Facebook Timeline? Your comment will be posted to MailOnline as usual

  • MAN UNITED'S RESURGENCE UNDER ERIK TEN HAG IS 'THANKS TO HIS FOUR-MAN LEADERSHIP GROUP'

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11271049/Man-Uniteds-resurgence-Erik-ten-Hag-thanks-four-man-leadership-group.html

    10/02/2022, 08:49

    45.0% Shortened!

    Manchester United's fortunes 'changed once Erik ten Hag built a four-man leadership group' By naming Maguire as a key leader, it seems Ten Hag is still heavily relying on the centre-back's experience and attitude at Old Trafford, despite axing him from United's starting line-up

    Ten Hag has also fostered a 'no d**kheads' rule in the transfer market in the hope of improving Manchester United's culture off the pitch, according to the Telegraph

    The Dutchman has trusted both Harry Maguire and Bruno Fernandes to be leaders at the club Goalkeepers Tom Heaton (L) and David de Gea (R) are also part of Ten Hag's leadership group The Red Devils' dressing room has seemed somewhat disjointed and dysfunctional in recent campaigns, but Ten Hag is working hard to instill a positivity and togetherness at Old Trafford

    The 52-year-old coach faces his toughest challenge to date on Sunday as Manchester United travel to the Etihad to take on defending champions and bitter rivals Manchester City

    Pep Guardiola's side did the double over United last campaign, winning 2-0 at Old Trafford last November before carving out a 4-1 thrashing in March

  • PM: I DIDN'T GIVE ANY CONDITIONS FOR A SNAP ELECTION

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/02/pm-i-didnt-give-any-conditions-for-a-snap-election

    10/02/2022, 08:49

    47.62% Shortened!

    Ismail Sabri, who is also an Umno vice-president, said he had reached a consensus as one of the top five of the leadership on Friday as there was a need to return the mandate to the people as soon as possible

    “We (Umno top five) have always stated that there is a need to hasten the general election as we want to return the mandate to the people

    We will have the Umno top five meeting, the political bureau meeting and the supreme council meeting before we decide

    “If there is a good reason to hold the snap polls, we will agree to it – that has always been our stand

    “As for the date (of dissolution of Parliament), please wait

    You have waited since last year, you can wait a little while more this year,” said Ismail Sabri

    On Sept 30, the Umno supreme council stated that the Prime Minister would be meeting the Yang di-Pertuan Agong soon to advise on the date for dissolving Parliament this year to pave the way for the next general election

    This came after months of insistence by Umno leaders led by party president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi to hold snap polls, despite reasoning by those supporting Ismail Sabri that it would be unwise to hold the elections during the monsoon season due to floods

    Umno secretary-general Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan released a statement on Friday that the dissolution of Parliament must be made as soon as possible to allow the 15th General Election to be held by this year

    The decision made by the Umno supreme council, he said, was consistent with the party’s stand from the beginning to return the mandate to Malaysians after the fall of the Pakatan Harapan government in February 2020

    The Umno supreme council had also instructed the entire party machinery to finalise all electoral preparations

    ['ismail', 'sabri', 'say', 'umno', 'party']

    Ismail Sabri, who is also an Umno vice-president, said he had reached a consensus as one of the top five of the leadership on Friday as there was a need to return the mandate to the people as soon as possible

    “We (Umno top five) have always stated that there is a need to hasten the general election as we want to return the mandate to the people

    We will have the Umno top five meeting, the political bureau meeting and the supreme council meeting before we decide

    “If there is a good reason to hold the snap polls, we will agree to it – that has always been our stand

    “As for the date (of dissolution of Parliament), please wait

    You have waited since last year, you can wait a little while more this year,” said Ismail Sabri

    On Sept 30, the Umno supreme council stated that the Prime Minister would be meeting the Yang di-Pertuan Agong soon to advise on the date for dissolving Parliament this year to pave the way for the next general election

    This came after months of insistence by Umno leaders led by party president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi to hold snap polls, despite reasoning by those supporting Ismail Sabri that it would be unwise to hold the elections during the monsoon season due to floods

    Umno secretary-general Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan released a statement on Friday that the dissolution of Parliament must be made as soon as possible to allow the 15th General Election to be held by this year

    The decision made by the Umno supreme council, he said, was consistent with the party’s stand from the beginning to return the mandate to Malaysians after the fall of the Pakatan Harapan government in February 2020

    The Umno supreme council had also instructed the entire party machinery to finalise all electoral preparations

    ['ismail', 'sabri', 'say', 'umno', 'party']



  • SUSPENSIONS WITHIN UMNO

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/02/suspensions-within-umno

    10/02/2022, 08:35

    66.67% Shortened!

    The party’s supreme council also agreed to sack blogger and former Bandar Tun Razak Umno division secretary Datuk Zaharin Mohd Yasin

    However, checks with supreme council members confirmed that the meeting had decided to suspend Tajuddin and Mohd Yusof for six years

    Supreme council members who attended the meeting, but who declined to be named, said that Tajuddin and Yusof were suspected of going against the top Umno leadership

    “Yes, I have been informed by members of the Umno supreme council that they decided to suspend me and Tajuddin

    I consider myself as Umno then, now and forever,” he added

    Tajuddin, who is also the Pasir Salak Umno division chief, when contacted confirmed the news with just a terse “yes”

    In June he was removed from the Umno supreme council for calling on party president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi to step down because he was “a liability to the party”

    “I will not appeal my dismissal and I thank the Umno supreme council for removing me as a party member

    The supreme council top five, including Ismail Sabri who is an Umno vice-president, met on Friday night and decided that the general election will indeed be held this year

    “What is wrong with us speaking up? All of us love Umno dearly and people like Tajuddin had stood by Umno during the worst of times

    That says something of the following he has in Umno

    ['umno', 'tajuddin', 'division', 'chief', 'supreme']

    The party’s supreme council also agreed to sack blogger and former Bandar Tun Razak Umno division secretary Datuk Zaharin Mohd Yasin

    However, checks with supreme council members confirmed that the meeting had decided to suspend Tajuddin and Mohd Yusof for six years

    Supreme council members who attended the meeting, but who declined to be named, said that Tajuddin and Yusof were suspected of going against the top Umno leadership

    “Yes, I have been informed by members of the Umno supreme council that they decided to suspend me and Tajuddin

    I consider myself as Umno then, now and forever,” he added

    Tajuddin, who is also the Pasir Salak Umno division chief, when contacted confirmed the news with just a terse “yes”

    In June he was removed from the Umno supreme council for calling on party president Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi to step down because he was “a liability to the party”

    “I will not appeal my dismissal and I thank the Umno supreme council for removing me as a party member

    The supreme council top five, including Ismail Sabri who is an Umno vice-president, met on Friday night and decided that the general election will indeed be held this year

    “What is wrong with us speaking up? All of us love Umno dearly and people like Tajuddin had stood by Umno during the worst of times

  • LIVERPOOL ANALYSIS - JURGEN KLOPP FACES SERIOUS QUESTIONS AS FABINHO CONCERN EMERGES

    https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/liverpool-analysis-jurgen-klopp-faces-25156252

    10/02/2022, 08:33

    56.0% Shortened!

    And there were certainly questions to be asked of Klopp’s decisions both before and during the game, particularly given how Liverpool were tactically flummoxed throughout an opening half-hour in which Brighton sauntered between the Reds' lines with alarming frequency

    With Andy Robertson injured, there was little option but to replace Kostas Tsimikas - has the Greek ever had a worse game for Liverpool? - with James Milner

    With the skipper gone, Brighton eventually regained the initiative and ultimately a point, Klopp mindful his side’s game management was found wanting in the latter stages

    Klopp and his coaching staff need to find a way to get Liverpool winning games again

    Firmino and Alisson frustration It was so nearly a very happy birthday for two Liverpool players today

    And how Liverpool were grateful

    That Liverpool were still in contention was down to Alisson, whose first-half saves from Leandro Trossard and Danny Welbeck ensured a fourth disappointing draw in the opening seven Premier League games wasn’t an even more damaging result

    Fabinho causes concern This should have been the day Fabinho celebrated his 150th start for Liverpool with a commanding midfield display

    Fabinho was hugely off the pace, his passing radar awry and his normally excellent positioning found wanting by Brighton’s bright start, even if there was an improvement second half

    This coming period will shape the second half of the season

    And Liverpool need Fabinho back to his best as soon as possible

    ['liverpool', 'brighton', 'klopp', 'first', 'game']

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11270439/Lisandro-Martinezs-height-NOT-issue-against-Erling-Haaland-claims-ex-United-star-Paul-Parker.html

    10/02/2022, 07:49

    69.44% Shortened!

    Trying to stop him on Sunday is Manchester United centre-back Lisandro Martinez, seven inches shorter and more than a stone and a half lighter.  Erling Haaland hopes to keep up his goal scoring form against Manchester United on Sunday For Paul Parker, the diminutive defender who won two Premier League titles with United, it’s wrong to write off Martinez because of his height

    No one is talking about Martinez’s ability

    He wasn’t the biggest, but he was a world-class centre-half

    Lisandro Martinez will be tasked with keeping the Manchester City striker quiet in the derby ‘If you have to be 6ft 6in to play centre-half, there’s a problem

    ‘When you’re the size Martinez is, playing against Haaland, you have to play with guile,’ said Parker

    ‘Martinez thrived in Holland, the tallest nation in the world

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/637822

    10/02/2022, 07:49

    75.56% Shortened!

    DBKL does not know the real root causes of the flood

    The eight KL residents should not give up on this flood mitigation matter

    They need to go all out even to the extent of citing DBKL and the mayor for contempt of court if they do not follow the court order at a later stage

    It seems Kuala Lumpur city planners stand out as the most competent and intelligent in how to prevent floods and destroy green areas at the same time

    Malaysia should get a Nobel prize for city planning where the environment and destruction can go hand in hand

    DBKL just needs to raise taxes by a swipe of the pen for all flood mitigation and preventive efforts

    You see, the only suckers are the city residents

    But the government knows best - call elections when Malaysia is flooded so that they can remain in power despite the misery of the people

    What a democratic country, where the will of the people determines their government

    Some people call it corruption and abuse of power, but no, we are battle-hardened to turn corruption into a virtue for the sake of development and people's welfare

    Now you see it, now you don't

    ['dbkl', 'flood', 'know', 'city', 'court']

  • CAAM REINSTATED TO CAT 1

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/02/caam-reinstated-to-cat-1

    10/02/2022, 07:49

    50.0% Shortened!

    FAA’s assessment covers CAAM’s role as an aviation regulator, and is not an assessment of Malaysian airlines or airports

    “We are very pleased to share that today (yesterday), FAA has officially announced that Malaysia has regained Category 1 of the International Aviation Safety Assessment (IASA) rating, and for this extremely proud achievement, I applaud everyone at CAAM for their tireless effort and commitment to this success,” said Dr Wee, who kickstarted the transformation process in CAAM after he assumed the role of Transport Minister in March 2020

    As part of the change, Dr Wee brought in Tan Sri Mohd Khairul Adib Abd Rahman, the former director-general of public service, to be CAAM chairman, and career pilot Datuk Capt Chester Voo, to be CEO

    In November 2019, FAA announced that Malaysia was assigned a Category 2 rating under the IASA programme due to non-compliance with the International Civil Aviation Organisation’s (ICAO) safety standards after a reassessment of CAAM earlier that year

    “The FAA assessment in 2019 found that CAAM needs to address 58 findings, whereby CAAM was able to resolve 25 of them in a relatively short time, while 33 other findings took much longer to resolve,” said Dr Wee, who gave a press conference yesterday in Montreal, the headquarters of ICAO, where he is attending the ICAO general assembly

    Capt Voo, who was among the delegation, expressed his gratitude to the ministry and the FAA for their support in CAAM’s reinstatement as a Category 1 regulator

    “There were 301 questions from the FAA audit that required 403 critical element responses, and I would like to express my gratitude to the FAA for its very instructive and very detailed efforts to achieve the best in safety for the civil aviation industry

    “This has shown Malaysia is compliant and has now demonstrated that we have an effective safety oversight capability

    On behalf of all of our team, I would like to commit to all that we will be facilitating an inclusive aviation industry with no compromise on safety,” said Capt Voo

    Among others, the Malaysian delegation included Khairul Adib, Transport Ministry’s secretary-general Datuk Isham Ishak, Malaysian Aviation Commission executive chairman Datuk Seri Saripuddin Kasim, Malaysia Aviation Group CEO Capt Izham Ismail, AirAsia Malaysia CEO Riad Asmat, Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd managing director Datuk Iskandar Mizal Mahmood and Batik Air CEO Capt Mushafiz Mustafa Bakri

    Malaysia’s participation as an ICAO council member enables the country to contribute to the international civil aviation industry and provides an avenue to voice matters affecting national interest, while also raising the country’s standing at the global level

    ['civil', 'aviation', 'malaysia', 'caam', 'category']

    FAA’s assessment covers CAAM’s role as an aviation regulator, and is not an assessment of Malaysian airlines or airports

    “We are very pleased to share that today (yesterday), FAA has officially announced that Malaysia has regained Category 1 of the International Aviation Safety Assessment (IASA) rating, and for this extremely proud achievement, I applaud everyone at CAAM for their tireless effort and commitment to this success,” said Dr Wee, who kickstarted the transformation process in CAAM after he assumed the role of Transport Minister in March 2020

    As part of the change, Dr Wee brought in Tan Sri Mohd Khairul Adib Abd Rahman, the former director-general of public service, to be CAAM chairman, and career pilot Datuk Capt Chester Voo, to be CEO

    In November 2019, FAA announced that Malaysia was assigned a Category 2 rating under the IASA programme due to non-compliance with the International Civil Aviation Organisation’s (ICAO) safety standards after a reassessment of CAAM earlier that year

    “The FAA assessment in 2019 found that CAAM needs to address 58 findings, whereby CAAM was able to resolve 25 of them in a relatively short time, while 33 other findings took much longer to resolve,” said Dr Wee, who gave a press conference yesterday in Montreal, the headquarters of ICAO, where he is attending the ICAO general assembly

    Capt Voo, who was among the delegation, expressed his gratitude to the ministry and the FAA for their support in CAAM’s reinstatement as a Category 1 regulator

    “There were 301 questions from the FAA audit that required 403 critical element responses, and I would like to express my gratitude to the FAA for its very instructive and very detailed efforts to achieve the best in safety for the civil aviation industry

    “This has shown Malaysia is compliant and has now demonstrated that we have an effective safety oversight capability

    On behalf of all of our team, I would like to commit to all that we will be facilitating an inclusive aviation industry with no compromise on safety,” said Capt Voo

    Among others, the Malaysian delegation included Khairul Adib, Transport Ministry’s secretary-general Datuk Isham Ishak, Malaysian Aviation Commission executive chairman Datuk Seri Saripuddin Kasim, Malaysia Aviation Group CEO Capt Izham Ismail, AirAsia Malaysia CEO Riad Asmat, Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd managing director Datuk Iskandar Mizal Mahmood and Batik Air CEO Capt Mushafiz Mustafa Bakri

  • BUDGET 2023 VOID IF PARLIAMENT DISBANDS BEFORE ITS PASSAGE, CONSTITUTIONAL EXPERTS SAY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/02/budget-2023-void-if-parliament-disbands-before-its-passage-constitutional-experts-say/30828

    10/02/2022, 07:35

    42.11% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise GEORGE TOWN, Oct 2 — Budget 2023 would have no legality if Parliament were to be dissolved before it could be approved as rumoured, constitutional lawyers explained

    Surendra explained that the same Bill could be tabled again in order for it to proceed to the second reading when debate could take place, or a new one submitted entirely

    Either scenario could lead to significant delays in passing Budget 2023 as both would have to wait until the 15th Parliament is sworn in, which could be weeks or months after the general election

    The tabling of Budget 2023 has been expedited by three weeks to October 7 this year, fuelling suspicion that this was to allow for a general election to be held almost immediately after

    These circumstances then fuelled rumours that the prime minister would advise the Yang di Pertuan Agong to dissolve Parliament immediately or shortly after the tabling of Budget 2023, reminiscent to events before the 1999 general election

    In 1999, Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad, who was the prime minister at the time, sought the dissolution of Parliament shortly after the tabling of Budget 2000 in November, and his finance minister was forced to table another one at the end of February 2000 or around three months later, after Barisan Nasional prevailed

    Former finance minister Lim Guan Eng said this would also be the case if Parliament were dissolved before Budget 2023 could be approved, which effectively meant the document would little more than a draft

    “There is a necessity for an economic reform for the country and for the budget to prioritise the people’s needs,” he said

    “The Budget should be taking care of the people’s needs,” he said

    Finance Minister Datuk Seri Tengku Zafrul Abdul Aziz is set to table Budget 2023 on October 7, three weeks earlier than initially scheduled

    Dewan Rakyat Speaker Tan Sri Azhar Azizan Harun reportedly said the first reading of the Budget 2023 will be on October 5 and then it will be brought for the second reading on October 7

    ['budget', 'would', 'parliament', 'could', 'say']

    About Us Advertise GEORGE TOWN, Oct 2 — Budget 2023 would have no legality if Parliament were to be dissolved before it could be approved as rumoured, constitutional lawyers explained

    Surendra explained that the same Bill could be tabled again in order for it to proceed to the second reading when debate could take place, or a new one submitted entirely

    Dewan Rakyat Speaker Tan Sri Azhar Azizan Harun reportedly said the first reading of the Budget 2023 will be on October 5 and then it will be brought for the second reading on October 7

    ['budget', 'would', 'parliament', 'could', 'say']



  • BETTER DEALS FOR TEACHERS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/02/better-deals-for-teachers

    10/02/2022, 07:35

    47.83% Shortened!

    He said the move would benefit 2,047 education service officers nationwide

    Under this move, headmasters on Grade DG48 (personal to holder) would no longer have to be “downgraded” to senior assistants or ordinary teachers in primary schools once they have been promoted to Grades DG52 and DG54 on a time-based excellence basis

    “This will upgrade the substantive grades for the posts of headmaster and senior assistant teacher, as well as enable those who have been promoted to a higher grade to remain in that position until Grade DG54,” he told a gathering of around 1,500 teachers organised by the National Union of the Teaching Profession (NUTP) here yesterday

    Ismail Sabri said teachers of a higher grade would also now be able to hold a higher position and certain positions in primary schools without being confined to the lower grades in the civil service pay scale

    “Headmasters at grade DG48 will not be ‘demoted’ to senior assistant teachers or regular teachers at primary schools when they are promoted to DG52 or DG54 on the time-based promotion scheme

    “Teachers at DG48 will be given the opportunity to be appointed assistant senior teachers in primary schools

    Senior assistant teachers in primary schools will now not be confined to those in grade DG44 only

    “Senior assistant teachers who have had their pay scale raised to DG54 can now remain in that position,” he said, adding that 90.68% of primary school teachers were now on a graduate level in the civil service

    “The Education Ministry is currently studying the structure of staffing for headmasters and senior assistant teachers in primary schools through the proposal of ‘Model Schools’ to keep those teachers up to DG54 to ensure that the administrative positions in schools are always maintained to preserve the harmony of the school community,” he said

    “We sometimes have to beg outsiders for money to buy gadgets so that our students do not get left behind as everything is digital nowadays,” said a teacher from Subang.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    We would love to keep you posted on the latest promotion

    ['grade', 'primary', 'school', 'senior', 'assistant']

    He said the move would benefit 2,047 education service officers nationwide

    Under this move, headmasters on Grade DG48 (personal to holder) would no longer have to be “downgraded” to senior assistants or ordinary teachers in primary schools once they have been promoted to Grades DG52 and DG54 on a time-based excellence basis

    “This will upgrade the substantive grades for the posts of headmaster and senior assistant teacher, as well as enable those who have been promoted to a higher grade to remain in that position until Grade DG54,” he told a gathering of around 1,500 teachers organised by the National Union of the Teaching Profession (NUTP) here yesterday

    Ismail Sabri said teachers of a higher grade would also now be able to hold a higher position and certain positions in primary schools without being confined to the lower grades in the civil service pay scale

    “Headmasters at grade DG48 will not be ‘demoted’ to senior assistant teachers or regular teachers at primary schools when they are promoted to DG52 or DG54 on the time-based promotion scheme

    “Teachers at DG48 will be given the opportunity to be appointed assistant senior teachers in primary schools

    Senior assistant teachers in primary schools will now not be confined to those in grade DG44 only

    “Senior assistant teachers who have had their pay scale raised to DG54 can now remain in that position,” he said, adding that 90.68% of primary school teachers were now on a graduate level in the civil service

    “The Education Ministry is currently studying the structure of staffing for headmasters and senior assistant teachers in primary schools through the proposal of ‘Model Schools’ to keep those teachers up to DG54 to ensure that the administrative positions in schools are always maintained to preserve the harmony of the school community,” he said

    “We sometimes have to beg outsiders for money to buy gadgets so that our students do not get left behind as everything is digital nowadays,” said a teacher from Subang.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • MALAYSIAN AIRLINES CAN NOW EXPAND NETWORKS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/02/malaysian-airlines-can-now-expand-networks

    10/02/2022, 07:35

    59.26% Shortened!

    For the Malaysia Aviation Group (MAG), it said it was glad to be involved in the task force that was formed which led to the reinstatement of the top-tiered ranking

    “MAG is confident that CAAM, under the leadership of CAAM CEO Datuk Capt Chester Voo and the rest of the management team, will be able to make significant contributions to the development of civil aviation’s safety and security in Malaysia,” said the group in a statement

    The airline group is the parent company of Malaysia Airlines and regional airlines Firefly and MASwings

    “AirAsia X is currently the only airline in the group that operates to the US directly, to Honolulu, Hawaii, through Osaka, Japan

    “The Category 1 safety rating will not only allow us to expand our future network plans, but also stabilise the country’s aviation industry as a whole

    “A massive congratulations to CAAM for meeting the International Civil Aviation Organisation (ICAO) safety standards again and to the Transport Ministry for their continued effort to improve the FAA’s rating on Malaysia’s aviation status,” he said

    Batik Air CEO Capt Mushafiz Mustafa Bakri described the reinstatement to Category 1 as good news for Malaysia and Malaysian carriers

    “The return to Category 1 also means that the FAA will remove any safety concerns it may have had, which will allow Malaysia to boost its tourism efforts as countries are now lifting travel restrictions,” he said in a statement

    Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd said Malaysia’s position as an aviation hub would be strengthened while its network connectivity would increase

    “The reinstatement of Malaysia’s International Aviation Safety Assessment (IASA) rating will strengthen Malaysia’s position as an aviation hub and increase its network connectivity,” said MAHB’s managing director, Datuk Iskandar Mizal Mahmood

    “The Transport Ministry and CAAM have put in massive efforts to ensure that Malaysia’s IASA Category 1 rating is reinstated

    may be moving from a housing boom into a housing bust

    Home prices and interest rates are high

    At the same time, the stock market is as volatile as ever, if not floundering, so people are looking for safer options

    Bezos not only made a bet on this being the case last year, but he doubled down on it earlier this year

    If you can’t beat ‘em, join ‘em — Bezos certainly stands to make money off his gamble, but so can the average investor with as little as $100 to invest

    The first of these offerings was fully funded in under 30 minutes Fractional real estate allows investors to use dollar cost averaging and invest through all market cycles, instead of having to time the market and predict the right time to buy

    You can check the status of your rebate here)

    Single filers can get up to $250 while people who file as head of household can get a maxim of $375

    You’re eligible if you filed a resident tax return for 2020 and 2021

    State senators proposed a one-time $200 payment to all licensed drivers in the state

  • SEEKING AT LEAST 16% DIVIDEND YIELD? THIS TOP ANALYST SUGGESTS 2 DIVIDEND STOCKS TO BUY

    78.0% Shortened!

    Genco Shipping (GNK) The first company we’ll look at is Genco Shipping, a bulk carrier in the global ocean shipping network

    The company’s last declared dividend, paid out in August, was for 50 cents per common share

    At its current rate, the dividend yields 16.5%, well ahead of the inflation rate

    In Nolan’s view, Genco is a Buy with a target price of $20, implying a one-year upside potential of 65%

    (To watch Nolan’s track record, click here) Nolan is hardly alone in his upbeat take on Genco

    (See GNK stock forecast on TipRanks) Eagle Bulk Shipping Inc

    (EGLE) The second stock dividend stock we'll look at is Eagle Bulk Shipping, another player in the drybulk carriage sector

    At the current rate, the dividend annualizes to $8.80 and gives a yield of 21%

    The dividend was last paid out in August

    This is another company whose performance – and especially, dividend performance – have caught Nolan’s attention

    The stock has an average price target of $72.40, which indicates ~76% upside potential from the trading price of $41.21

  • DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT RETIRING UNTIL YOU HAVE THESE 3 THINGS COMPLETELY PAID OFF — YOUR MORTGAGE ISN'T ONE OF THEM

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/dont-even-think-retiring-until-153000554.html

    66.67% Shortened!

    The interest rate on those loans could surge to 7.54% in the new year

    So all those payments take away from your retirement income

    While these credit card balances should be paid down quickly, you shouldn’t let them delay saving for your retirement

    Instead, consider lowering your mortgage payments to use those funds to pay down other high interest loans

    Finally, auto loans are another area to pay off before retirement

    As of August 2022, the average car loan for a buyer with good credit was 7.88%, according to MyAutoloan

    But if you have bad credit, that soars up to 19.87%

    That’s about as much as the interest rate on a credit card

    What’s more, you’ll have to take into consideration these payments for your retirement

    If $400 goes into a car payment, and $300 to a credit card and more for student loans, suddenly you have far less cash on hand for your retirement

    So why not pay down your mortgage too? It’s not just lower interest rates, although with the average national mortgage rate for a 30-year fixed rate at about 6.5%, that is an advantage

    ['retirement', 'pay', 'loan', 'mortgage', 'interest']

    Notably, the British pound is among the currencies performing poorly against the dollar.  Despite the dollar’s strong performance, the author of the personal finance book ‘Rich Dad, Poor Dad’ Robert Kiyosaki, believes the U.S

    currency’s strength will be short-lived.  In a tweet on October 1, Kiyosaki noted that the dollar will potentially crash early 2023 but suggested that silver might be an alternative asset to cushion against a possible dollar crash.  “Will U.S

    dollar follow English Pound Sterling? I believe it will

    dollar will crash by January 2023 after Fed pivots

    To profit from crash of U.S

    Silver is a bargain,” said Kiyosaki

    Old ENGLAND died this week

    Old English Pound died this week, as did old English pensions

    Don’t be a victim like Old English of Old England

  • FORMER F1 CHAMPION HAMILTON ALLOWED TO WEAR HIS NOSE STUD, BUT MERCEDES COP RM113,000 FINE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/10/02/former-f1-champion-hamilton-allowed-to-wear-his-nose-stud-but-mercedes-cop-rm113000-fine

    10/02/2022

    63.33% Shortened!

    Sunday, 02 Oct 2022

    "In recent events Hamilton had removed the piercing prior to the competition

    The team assumed, without enquiring of Hamilton, that he had followed or would follow the same procedure for this event," said the FIA stewards in their ruling

    Given these circumstances, we fine the team 25,000 euros." Seven-time world champion Hamilton told reporters that he was wearing the stud again on the advice of doctors after suffering from an infection when he removed it

    "I've had my jewellery and my nose stud for years and obviously we had that whole commotion at the beginning of the year," Hamilton said

    They gave me for many races an exemption so I could find a solution," Hamilton explained

    "Broadcast footage showed Hamilton wearing an item of jewellery in the form of a body piercing (nose stud) during the session," said a statement from the stewards

    Hamilton "explained that he had been advised by his doctors not to remove it for the time being..

    the team produced reports from a medical practitioner that confirmed Hamilton's explanation

    "But our zip is metal, our buckle around our helmet is metal, we've got the wires with aluminium metal in them," Hamilton continued

    It's all a bit silly

    ['hamilton', 'wear', 'nose', 'stud', 'steward']

  • 'THIS IS MY BIGGEST REGRET': HOME-BASED BAKER IN SG RECOUNTS LOSING INSTAGRAM ACCOUNT TO SCAMMER

    https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2022/10/02/this-is-my-biggest-regret-home-based-baker-in-sg-recounts-losing-instagram-account-to-scammer

    10/02/2022

    70.27% Shortened!

    Scammers used Faisel’s hijacked Instagram account to advertise fake investment schemes to his 5,000 followers

    The customer told Faisel to take a screenshot of an Instagram message he will receive and forward it to him

    Faisel did as he was asked

    The screenshot he had sent to the supposed customer contained a link from Instagram to reset his password

    The scammer used it and locked Faisel out of his account

    This is my biggest regret.” Scammers used his hijacked Instagram account to advertise fake investment schemes and contests to his 5,000 followers

    It would be too expensive.” Faisel has tried many ways to reclaim his account, including sending Instagram a photo of himself holding his NRIC and a video selfie

    But so far, he has been unsuccessful in confirming that he is the genuine owner of the account

    The company is aware of Faisel’s case and is in the process of recovering his account

    Instagram may not know that it is a different person accessing my account

    Instagram and WhatsApp, too

  • GET READY FOR ANOTHER BEAR-MARKET RALLY, STRATEGIST SAYS

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/get-ready-another-bearmarket-rally-strategist-says

    10/02/2022

    57.69% Shortened!

    Yet with investor sentiment in the gutter and the Bank of England vowing to open the chequebook to prop up its bond market, could another equities bear-market rally be in the cards? Julian Emanuel says so

    And it really goes back to this idea that after 25 years of quiescent inflation, we had a breakout in the readings

    That's now been over a year and obviously really feeding into the Fed's (US Federal Reserve) imperative to get inflation under control by going on this unprecedented degree of hiking

    This is the kind of rapid acceleration and tightening that reverberates across the globe

    The conduit has really been the strength in the dollar feeding into the UK

    You've had a leadership change, the queen's passing, a new prime minister, a new government — just total huge challenges in a market that had already been showing strains, frankly, since the Brexit vote in 2016

    So really, testing the outer bands of volatility across every asset that’s in the UK

    Because it was clear the policy mismatch between the new Truss government and Kwasi Kwarteng, the chancellor of the Exchequer, and where the Bank of England felt it needs to go — needed to go, needs to go, and that's an open concept, which is why I keep changing tenses — is that it's really caused this instability that got some feeling as if there was this idea that the UK was about to become an emerging market

    That type of volatility

    Basically from our point of view, these kinds of bear markets — and if you go back to the highs in January — they don't move in straight lines

    The VIX has started spiking, you've seen investor sentiment that's really only as bad as it's ever been near the trough in 2009, and near the bottom of the first Gulf War bear market in 1990

    ['search', 'new', 'year', 'bank', 'bond']

    Yet with investor sentiment in the gutter and the Bank of England vowing to open the chequebook to prop up its bond market, could another equities bear-market rally be in the cards? Julian Emanuel says so

    And it really goes back to this idea that after 25 years of quiescent inflation, we had a breakout in the readings

    That's now been over a year and obviously really feeding into the Fed's (US Federal Reserve) imperative to get inflation under control by going on this unprecedented degree of hiking

    This is the kind of rapid acceleration and tightening that reverberates across the globe

    The conduit has really been the strength in the dollar feeding into the UK

    You've had a leadership change, the queen's passing, a new prime minister, a new government — just total huge challenges in a market that had already been showing strains, frankly, since the Brexit vote in 2016

    So really, testing the outer bands of volatility across every asset that’s in the UK

    Because it was clear the policy mismatch between the new Truss government and Kwasi Kwarteng, the chancellor of the Exchequer, and where the Bank of England felt it needs to go — needed to go, needs to go, and that's an open concept, which is why I keep changing tenses — is that it's really caused this instability that got some feeling as if there was this idea that the UK was about to become an emerging market

    That type of volatility

    Basically from our point of view, these kinds of bear markets — and if you go back to the highs in January — they don't move in straight lines

    The VIX has started spiking, you've seen investor sentiment that's really only as bad as it's ever been near the trough in 2009, and near the bottom of the first Gulf War bear market in 1990

    ['search', 'new', 'year', 'bank', 'bond']

    https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/man-city-man-united-highlights-25158539

    10/02/2022

    78.0% Shortened!

    They had already seen United ship four at the same ground this year and United have conceded at least four in eight games within the last year

    City surpassed the former and briefly emulated the latter scoreline

    That United's season is not defined by a derby is a reflection of how far they have fallen

    Yesteryear, annihilation by City win was a seismic result

    A six-goal performance is almost an obligation for Pep Guardiola's supreme City

    For the second time this season alone, United skulked off 4-0 down at the interval

    What will smart for Erik ten Hag is City denuded United more effortlessly than in March when mutiny was simmering under the interim charge of Ralf Rangnick

    The irrepressible Erling Haaland did everything, plundering a third hat-trick of his City career and chiding the United supporters who reminded him of his father's encounter with Roy Keane

    Ten Hag has to make significant changes in response to this, which threatened to be United's joint-worst result in the Premier League era

    United's naivety was encapsulated by the second goal

    Malacia was alarmingly distant from Foden off the ball at kick-off and off the pace for his second and City's fourth goal

  • ARSENAL GET SOME REVENGE AS CONTE'S GAME PLAN COMES UNSTUCK

    https://www.espn.com/soccer/english-premier-league/story/4757535/arsenal-get-some-revenge-over-spurs-as-contes-gameplan-comes-unstuck

    10/01/2022, 23:04

    71.79% Shortened!

    Tottenham's hopes of getting back into the game were ruined when Emerson Royal was sent off for a challenge on Gabriel Martinelli just after the hour, and soon afterward Granit Xhaka wrapped up the points

    In doing so, Arsenal extended their stay at the top of the Premier League and struck an early blow in the race between these sides to prove they are ready to challenge Liverpool and Manchester City for the title

    Kane converted from the spot but individual errors were Tottenham's undoing

    He also extended a fine individual record against Arsenal, moving to 14 goals -- half of them on penalties -- in 16 Premier League games

    "I hope this will give them more belief that they can win at this level in the way we want them to play

    "With the red card, [went] the game

    It was a really difficult game after that

    Arsenal's 12-game unbeaten streak vs Spurs at home in the Premier League is the longest such streak since a run of 17 between 1993 and 2010

    Tottenham have just won twice at Arsenal in the Premier League era, stretching back to 1992

    Emerson Royal's red card was the fifth Tottenham have received at Emirates Stadium in the Premier League, the team's most red cards at a single venue in the competition

    And another away game follows that as Tottenham make the short trip to the south coast to take on Brighton on Saturday.

    ['arsenal', 'tottenham', 'spur', 'game', 'premier']

    For help understanding what a recession is and how to strategize your investments to navigate a down market, consider working with a trusted financial advisor.  Is a Recession Coming?  Other factors also are part of whether an economy is in a recession

    Even if inflation disappeared tomorrow – dropping to 0% for the rest of the year – the inflation rate for December would be 6.5%

    How to Prepare Your Portfolio for a Recession Stocks already are down this year and would decline even more in a recession as corporate earnings suffer

    Stocks typically drop before a recession and bottom out before the downturn ends

    If you don’t have one, create one with a trustworthy financial advisor

    will experience a recession in the next 24 months

    Tips for Weathering a Recession A financial advisor can help you recession-proof your portfolio, while still growing your money

    If you’re still in the market when a recession hits, consider these five things to invest in during a recession

    Mikel Arteta made two changes to the team that defeated Brentford last time out as Oleksandr Zinchenko and Martin Odegaard returned while Thomas Partey started after some injury concerns

    Arsenal dominated the opening exchanges and took the lead with 20 minutes gone through a Partey pearler

    Just nine minutes later, Harry Kane brought Spurs level after Gabriel brought down Richarlison to undo all of Arsenal’s good work

    The visitors grew into the game after drawing level and headed into half-time with a share of the spoils

    Arsenal made their advantage pay as Granit Xhaka fired his shot low and across Lloris after some good work from Martinelli

    The Gunners played out the remaining time without breaking a sweat to secure north London bragging rights

    Once again, he was a brick wall and often the only thing standing in between Spurs and Arsenal’s goal

    Get it done, Arsenal, because William Saliba is quickly becoming the best central defender in the Premier League

  • PM ISMAIL SABRI: GRADE FOR PRIMARY SCHOOL HEADMASTERS, SENIOR ASSISTANTS UPGRADED TO MAXIMUM DG54

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/01/pm-ismail-sabri-grade-for-primary-school-headmasters-senior-assistants-upgraded-to-maximum-dg54/31079

    10/01/2022, 15:04

    42.86% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 ― The grade for primary school headmasters and senior assistants will be upgraded to the maximum DG54, announced Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob

    The move, he said, would benefit 2,047 education service officers nationwide

    He said headmasters on Grade DG48 (personal to holder) also would no longer have to drop to senior assistants or ordinary teachers in primary schools once they have been promoted to Grades DG52 and DG54 on a time-based excellence basis

    “This will upgrade the substantive grades for the posts of headmaster and senior assistant teacher, as well as enable those who have been promoted to a higher grade to remain in that position until Grade DG54,” he said

    The Prime Minister said the issue of the grade for headmasters in primary schools only limited to Grade DG48 and senior assistants to Grade 44 was among issues raised by NUTP to him

    Ismail Sabri said the Education Ministry was also studying the staffing structure of headmasters and senior assistants in primary schools through the proposed School Model with the setting of flexi grades up to DG54 to safeguard the position of school administrators, while maintaining harmony among the school staff

    Apart from that, Grade DG48 officers in the education service (PPP) will also be given the opportunity to be appointed as senior assistants in primary schools, he said, adding that this meant that senior assistants in primary schools would not be limited to Grade DG44 only

    He said senior assistants who had been promoted to a higher grade could also remain in that post until Grade DG54

    The Prime Minister also announced that the career path of Outstanding Teachers in primary schools will also be extended up to Grades DG52 and DG54 as 90.68 percent of primary school teachers were now graduate teachers

    The government, he said, was also making efforts to address various issues plaguing the country's education, such as school maintenance and security, allowance of senior assistants that need to be reviewed and the shortage of teachers

    He said the government was also concerned about the issue of dilapidated schools in Sabah and Sarawak and it would be given serious attention in the 2023 Budget which will be tabled this Friday

    The prime minister also called on parents to always cooperate with teachers and the school, who strived to ensure their children excel academically and also in co-curricular activities

    ['grade', 'primary', 'school', 'senior', 'assistant']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 ― The grade for primary school headmasters and senior assistants will be upgraded to the maximum DG54, announced Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob

    The move, he said, would benefit 2,047 education service officers nationwide

    He said headmasters on Grade DG48 (personal to holder) also would no longer have to drop to senior assistants or ordinary teachers in primary schools once they have been promoted to Grades DG52 and DG54 on a time-based excellence basis

    “This will upgrade the substantive grades for the posts of headmaster and senior assistant teacher, as well as enable those who have been promoted to a higher grade to remain in that position until Grade DG54,” he said

    The Prime Minister said the issue of the grade for headmasters in primary schools only limited to Grade DG48 and senior assistants to Grade 44 was among issues raised by NUTP to him

    Ismail Sabri said the Education Ministry was also studying the staffing structure of headmasters and senior assistants in primary schools through the proposed School Model with the setting of flexi grades up to DG54 to safeguard the position of school administrators, while maintaining harmony among the school staff

    Apart from that, Grade DG48 officers in the education service (PPP) will also be given the opportunity to be appointed as senior assistants in primary schools, he said, adding that this meant that senior assistants in primary schools would not be limited to Grade DG44 only

    He said senior assistants who had been promoted to a higher grade could also remain in that post until Grade DG54

    The Prime Minister also announced that the career path of Outstanding Teachers in primary schools will also be extended up to Grades DG52 and DG54 as 90.68 percent of primary school teachers were now graduate teachers

    The government, he said, was also making efforts to address various issues plaguing the country's education, such as school maintenance and security, allowance of senior assistants that need to be reviewed and the shortage of teachers

    He said the government was also concerned about the issue of dilapidated schools in Sabah and Sarawak and it would be given serious attention in the 2023 Budget which will be tabled this Friday

    The prime minister also called on parents to always cooperate with teachers and the school, who strived to ensure their children excel academically and also in co-curricular activities

    ['grade', 'primary', 'school', 'senior', 'assistant']



  • STOCK MARKET TODAY: DOW IN WORST QUARTERLY STREAK SINCE 2015 AS BEARS IN CONTROL BY INVESTING.COM

    https://www.investing.com/news/stock-market-news/stock-market-today-dow-in-worst-quarterly-streak-since-2015-as-bears-in-control-2903226

    10/01/2022

    47.62% Shortened!

    By Yasin Ebrahim                                Investing.com -- The Dow fell Friday, rounding off its worst quarterly losing streak since 2015 that has pushed stocks into bear-market territory as investors prepared for further Federal Reserve rate hikes to cool inflation that continues to run hot

    The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 1.7%, or 490 points, the Nasdaq was down 1.5%, and the S&P 500 fell 1.4%

    All three major averages fell for the third straight quarter.  The personal consumption expenditure price index, the fed’s preferred inflation measure, showed that inflation rose more than expected in August

    This “compounds the pressure for the [Fed] to stay on course in its fight against inflation,” Stifel said in a note

    Fed vice chair Lael Brainard on Friday cautioned against the central bank reversing course on monetary policy too early, saying monetary policy would need to be “restrictive for some time to have confidence that inflation is moving back to target” After hiking rates by 3% in just six months, the fed continues to echo the need for further hikes, stoking worries among investors that the central bank could overshoot on tightening and push the economy into a deep recession

    The push higher in inflation, however, hasn’t yet had a material impact on the consumer, according to personal spending data Friday, to force a material change in consumer spending, suggesting a deep recession isn't on the horizon

    “We haven't seen that change [in consumer spending habits],” Brian Mulberry, client portfolio manager at Zacks Investment Management told Investing.com in an interview on Friday

    Add a Comment We encourage you to use comments to engage with other users, share your perspective and ask questions of authors and each other

    Avoid profanity, slander or personal attacks directed at an author or another user

    By Yasin Ebrahim                                Investing.com -- The Dow fell Friday, rounding off its worst quarterly losing streak since 2015 that has pushed stocks into bear-market territory as investors prepared for further Federal Reserve rate hikes to cool inflation that continues to run hot

    The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 1.7%, or 490 points, the Nasdaq was down 1.5%, and the S&P 500 fell 1.4%

    All three major averages fell for the third straight quarter.  The personal consumption expenditure price index, the fed’s preferred inflation measure, showed that inflation rose more than expected in August

    This “compounds the pressure for the [Fed] to stay on course in its fight against inflation,” Stifel said in a note

    Fed vice chair Lael Brainard on Friday cautioned against the central bank reversing course on monetary policy too early, saying monetary policy would need to be “restrictive for some time to have confidence that inflation is moving back to target” After hiking rates by 3% in just six months, the fed continues to echo the need for further hikes, stoking worries among investors that the central bank could overshoot on tightening and push the economy into a deep recession

    The push higher in inflation, however, hasn’t yet had a material impact on the consumer, according to personal spending data Friday, to force a material change in consumer spending, suggesting a deep recession isn't on the horizon

    “We haven't seen that change [in consumer spending habits],” Brian Mulberry, client portfolio manager at Zacks Investment Management told Investing.com in an interview on Friday

  • HEAPS OF PRAISE FOR RIDERS WHO SPRANG INTO ACTION TO HELP ABDUCTION VICTIM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/10/01/heaps-of-praise-for-riders-who-sprang-into-action-to-help-abduction-victim

    10/01/2022, 13:04

    56.0% Shortened!

    "This is the real semangat (spirit) of Keluarga Malaysia where Malaysians help one another without seeing the skin colour," the social media user said

    "Many looked on and went on their merry way but these humble riders did their best to help the poor guy," the user said

    Another social media user said riders were always the first to step in and offer assistance

    It was reported that a 38-year-old businessman was abducted in front of a restaurant in Pandan Indah by a group of men in a white Toyota Vellfire at 5.03pm on Thursday

    Ampang Jaya OCPD Asst Comm Mohamad Farouk Eshak had said the victim had gone to a restaurant alone when he was approached by a group of men

    "He was approached by a group of men who forced him into the Vellfire

    The victim shouted for help to no avail," he said

    However, the victim was later released and went straight to the Ampang Jaya police headquarters at about 10.45pm on Thursday, he said

    He was treated at Hospital Ampang

    ACP Mohamad Farouk thanked the public who tried to assist the victim during the incident

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • LIVERPOOL SHOULD SIGN 24-GOAL FORWARD AS BRAZIL MOMENT PROVES HE IS ROBERTO FIRMINO HEIR

    https://www.liverpool.com/liverpool-fc-news/transfer-news/liverpool-roberto-firmino-goal-brazil-25146530

    10/01/2022, 10:05

    42.11% Shortened!

    Liverpool could have seen a glimpse of a potential replacement for Roberto Firmino in Brazil's latest victory during the last international break

    Sign up to receive the best LFC opinion direct to your inbox We have more newsletters This summer might be the end of an era at Liverpool

    The Kop will be sad to see him depart, though in reality at 31 years old, Liverpool will definitely be saying farewell to Firmino at the right time

    Therefore, should Firmino, who made another 16 goal contributions last season and already six in eight games this season, depart next summer, Liverpool will have to find another player to maintain Jürgen Klopp's depth in attack

    And in order to find him, the Reds may have been given an ideal glimpse at a player who could be the perfect potential replacement for Firmino

    Flamengo's 25-year-old forward, Pedro, is regarded by many as one of the heirs to Firmino's throne in the national team, and it's easy to see why

    The forward has a similar work rate and is blessed with a technical ability that is on par with Firmino

    Sign up to the Liverpool.com newsletter here — it only takes a few seconds! This season, Pedro has already scored 24 goals for Flamengo in 53 games, but just like Firmino, his game doesn't solely rely on goals

    In the most recent international break, Pedro showed a glimpse of his talent for the Brazilian national team, too

    That goal highlighted Pedro's ability to step up and play at a higher level

    He may not just be an ideal heir to Firmino's throne at international level, but perhaps at Anfield, too.

    ['liverpool', 'firmino', 'last', 'newsletter', 'depart']

  • YOURSAY | GE15 THIS YEAR, COME RAIN OR HIGH WATER

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/news/637734

    10/01/2022, 09:05

    71.79% Shortened!

    Since when was Umno running the government? They don’t have 112 MPs, do they? Even with PAS, they don’t

    So how can they so brazenly think they can dictate when an election should or should not be held? Yes, the PM is a member of Umno but surely that does not confer any rights for Umno to think they can dictate when an election should or should not be held

    Let’s see how much substance there is to this demand from the Umno supreme council

    Not to a corrupt and bigoted party

    Because your party thinks it can win an election now, you want to put the nation’s lives at risk

    Voter apathy will work against Harapan

    Umno and PAS will play the racial card

    A nation deserves the government it elects

    If the majority want a crooked and corrupt government, so be it

    It is on these grounds that every voter must be ensured one’s right to vote is unobstructed

    I am not one to prioritise a general election over human life and suffering

    ['party', 'umno', 'government', 'election', 'right']

    Since when was Umno running the government? They don’t have 112 MPs, do they? Even with PAS, they don’t

  • NEW SPONSORSHIP SPURS CHEAM AND GOH TO ADVANCE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/10/01/new-sponsorship-spurs-cheam-and-goh-to-advance

    10/01/2022, 08:04

    56.0% Shortened!

    June Wei and Jin Wei, who recently signed up with new sponsor Fusionex, marched into the semi-finals of the men and women’s singles events respectively in the Vietnam Open at the Nguyen Du Stadium in Ho Chi Minh yesterday

    It was a memorable day for June Wei as he battled past Taiwan’s Lee Chia-hao 22-20, 25-27, 22-20 in a thrilling 81-minute battle in the quarter-finals to reach only his first semis in four years

    He will take on China’s Sun Feixiang today for a place in the final

    June Wei is determined to keep his focus and reach what will be his first World Tour final since finishing runners-up in the Dutch Open in 2018

    I just want to stay focused and not think too much after this,” said June Wei

    Jin Wei booked her own spot after coming from behind to seal a 9-21, 21-10, 21-7 win over homester Thi Anh Vu

    The 2017 Kuala Lumpur SEA Games champion Jin Wei will take on Thi Phuong Tran of Vietnam next, who defeated S

    Indonesian coach Nova Armada was happy with June Wei and Jin Wei’s good showing and thanked their new sponsor for stepping in

    “June Wei and Jin Wei have received new sponsorship from Fusionex

    June Wei has shown good improvement since then and Jin Wei is also playing well now

    Kisona 21-19, 21-7; Goh Jin Wei bt Vu Thi Anh (Vie) 9-21, 21-10, 21-7

    ['take', 'june', 'wei', 'goh', 'jin']

  • WHAT REALLY HAPPENED IN MALAYSIA’S RECENT ABDUCTION HOAXES? (VIDEO)

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/10/01/what-really-happened-in-malaysias-recent-abduction-hoaxes-video/31005

    10/01/2022, 07:35

    66.67% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 1 — What was initially thought to be a brazen kidnapping attempt outside a school in Ipoh, Perak, later turned out to be a hoax, and has spawned several other claims that have also been debunked by the police

    Malay Mail examines what was claimed in the series of incidents, and the information that were later discovered

    The claim was made in a video showing a white panel van, which went viral shortly after it was posted online

    Some of those resharing the video also claimed children were being abducted purportedly for organ harvesting

    Police also traced the white panel van shown in the video and found it to be a vehicle for worker transport

    Skandaguru also said that the organ harvesting claims date back to 2017 and were being reshared in light of the incident

    The woman who made the claim then apologised

    Johor police chief Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said it was not of any kidnapping attempt, before noting the spike in claims resembling the Ipoh incident

    “For example, it’s okay to say there may be kidnappers out there, keep an eye out for more news and information rather than saying things like ‘there are kidnappers here, be careful, protect your kids’, things like that

    “Google is the best way

    “Also, always be a sceptic

    ['claim', 'police', 'claimed', 'incident', 'say']

    Malay Mail examines what was claimed in the series of incidents, and the information that were later discovered

    “For example, it’s okay to say there may be kidnappers out there, keep an eye out for more news and information rather than saying things like ‘there are kidnappers here, be careful, protect your kids’, things like that

    “Google is the best way

    “Also, always be a sceptic

  • WALL ST POSTS THIRD STRAIGHT QUARTERLY LOSS AS INFLATION WEIGHS, RECESSION LOOMS BY REUTERS

    https://www.investing.com/news/economy/futures-edge-higher-ahead-of-key-inflation-data-2902855

    10/01/2022, 07:04

    57.69% Shortened!

    By Stephen Culp NEW YORK (Reuters) - The S&P 500 closed the books on its steepest September decline in two decades on Friday, skidding across the finish line of a tumultuous quarter fraught with historically hot inflation, rising interest rates and recession fears

    "It's another ugly day to end an ugly quarter in what’s looking like a very ugly year," said Ryan Detrick, chief market strategist at Carson Group in Omaha, Nebraska

    "Investors will look back and realize this was the year the Fed pulled a total 180 on their views on inflation and quickly turned incredibly hawkish." The Federal Reserve has rattled markets by engaging in its most relentless series of interest rate hikes in decades in order to rein in stubbornly high inflation, which has many market participants eyeing key economic data for signs of a looming recession

    "The realization that the Fed is doing anything they can to combat 40-year-high inflation has investors worried they will push the economy over the edge and into recession," Detrick added

    The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 500.1 points, or 1.71%, to 28,725.51; the S&P 500 lost 54.85 points, or 1.51%, to 3,585.62; and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 161.89 points, or 1.51%, to 10,575.62

    Declining issues outnumbered advancing ones on the NYSE by a 1.45-to-1 ratio; on Nasdaq, a 1.38-to-1 ratio favored decliners

    The S&P 500 posted no new 52-week highs and 93 new lows; the Nasdaq Composite recorded 27 new highs and 380 new lows

    Add a Comment We encourage you to use comments to engage with other users, share your perspective and ask questions of authors and each other

    Avoid profanity, slander or personal attacks directed at an author or another user

    %USER_NAME% was successfully added to your Block List Since you’ve just unblocked this person, you must wait 48 hours before renewing the block

    ['position', 'add', 'successfully', 'new', 'quarter']

    By Stephen Culp NEW YORK (Reuters) - The S&P 500 closed the books on its steepest September decline in two decades on Friday, skidding across the finish line of a tumultuous quarter fraught with historically hot inflation, rising interest rates and recession fears

    "It's another ugly day to end an ugly quarter in what’s looking like a very ugly year," said Ryan Detrick, chief market strategist at Carson Group in Omaha, Nebraska

    "Investors will look back and realize this was the year the Fed pulled a total 180 on their views on inflation and quickly turned incredibly hawkish." The Federal Reserve has rattled markets by engaging in its most relentless series of interest rate hikes in decades in order to rein in stubbornly high inflation, which has many market participants eyeing key economic data for signs of a looming recession

    "The realization that the Fed is doing anything they can to combat 40-year-high inflation has investors worried they will push the economy over the edge and into recession," Detrick added

    The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 500.1 points, or 1.71%, to 28,725.51; the S&P 500 lost 54.85 points, or 1.51%, to 3,585.62; and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 161.89 points, or 1.51%, to 10,575.62

    Declining issues outnumbered advancing ones on the NYSE by a 1.45-to-1 ratio; on Nasdaq, a 1.38-to-1 ratio favored decliners

    The S&P 500 posted no new 52-week highs and 93 new lows; the Nasdaq Composite recorded 27 new highs and 380 new lows

  • IS THIS THE END FOR BANGKOK'S INFAMOUS NO.8 BUS?

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/10/01/is-this-the-end-for-bangkoks-infamous-no8-bus

    10/01/2022, 07:04

    54.17% Shortened!

    No.8 bus in Bangkok, which is known for overtaking

    Welcome aboard the No.8 bus

    Infamous in the Thai capital, the No.8 route has spawned parody songs, viral TikToks, horrified YouTube videos and even a feature-length Fast & Furious-style film

    “It is a competition,” said driver Aphisak Sodmui, who has helmed his “hot” bus – as the non-airconditioned open-windowed models are known – for the past decade

    The problem, according to Thai transport expert Sumet Ongkittikul, lies with the private firms that lease the route concession from the central Bangkok Mass Transit Authority

    Driver Aphisak supplements his daily wage of between 150 and 200 baht (RM18.50 and RM24.50) with 10% of the daily ticket sales

    “We have to complete the route at least four times a day for us to have enough money to live,” he said

    Passenger Sai Pin, 47, said she had seen a change since the transition to the new buses with a slightly higher fare of 15 baht (RM1.85)

    “With the old buses, you might encounter lots of fast driving

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    Kindly fill the form below We hope you enjoy this feature!

    ['fast', 'passenger', 'bus', 'route', 'driver']

    No.8 bus in Bangkok, which is known for overtaking

    Welcome aboard the No.8 bus

    Infamous in the Thai capital, the No.8 route has spawned parody songs, viral TikToks, horrified YouTube videos and even a feature-length Fast & Furious-style film

    “It is a competition,” said driver Aphisak Sodmui, who has helmed his “hot” bus – as the non-airconditioned open-windowed models are known – for the past decade

    The problem, according to Thai transport expert Sumet Ongkittikul, lies with the private firms that lease the route concession from the central Bangkok Mass Transit Authority

    “We have to complete the route at least four times a day for us to have enough money to live,” he said
