  • MARK GONZALEZ THE DIFFERENCE-MAKER AGAIN AS LIVERPOOL LEGENDS SINK MAN UNITED

    https://www.thisisanfield.com/2022/09/mark-gonzalez-the-difference-maker-again-as-liverpool-legends-sink-man-united/

    09/25/2022

    52.17% Shortened!

    Mark Gonzalez was on target again as Liverpool Legends came from behind to beat Man United 2-1 in an entertaining charity match at Anfield on Saturday

    Legends of the North (2), Anfield

    Sinama-Pongolle 82′ After a rendition of You’ll Never Walk Alone, sung by many attending Anfield for the first time, Man United started quickly and opened the scoring thanks to a fantastic volley by Dimitar Berbatov

    Another of Liverpool’s ‘best midfield in the world’ was involved as well

    Though the match was well-mannered in aid of the LFC Foundation, Momo Sissoko, who was doing the lion’s share of the midfield’s running, showed there was no love lost when he gave Berbatov a cheeky nudge in the back after the Kop had jovially booed the United team’s arrival

    Roy Keane wasn’t even on the pitch yet! Liverpool continued to attack and Aurelio was the next to shoot from distance

    He sliced his effort well wide, though, and was swiftly sent back to the halfway line by his captain, Alonso

    The Mark Gonzalez goal that brought LFC Legends level ? — Liverpool FC (@LFC) September 24, 2022 Djimi Traore’s start wasn’t as positive

    The hush gave way, though, when Roy Keane and Denis Irwin ran on to a din of boos

    The two old boys couldn’t help defensively though when Florent Sinama-Pongolle latched onto a loose ball near the penalty spot and dispatched it into the bottom corner

    Sinama-Pongolle’s sidefooted finish turned out to be the winner in the game, giving the Anfield attendees cause for celebration on the final whistle

    ['anfield', 'gonzalez', 'liverpool', 'legend', 'united']

  • LATEST ENGLAND FLOP SHOWS THERE ARE ONLY THREE PROBLEMS WITH THE THREE LIONS… THE DEFENCE, MIDFIELD AND A...

    https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/19910639/england-world-cup-nations-league/

    09/25/2022

    64.52% Shortened!

    England have gone from being one of the most prolific teams in Europe to failing to score from open play in five consecutive games

    One goal always looked likely to be enough to beat an England team short on ideas and intensity

    Why does Raheem Sterling, to take the most high-profile example, look like a pale imitation of the player he is at club level and has long been for England? Captain Harry Kane seemed set to beat Wayne Rooney’s 53-goal all-time scoring record in time for the World Cup

    I know the strikers and attacking players here are confident players.” The problem is, England don’t look confident

    It feels like a lot of the intensity and belief has gone out of Southgate’s England, particularly up front

    Bukayo Saka found himself playing left wing-back in Milan on Friday night, but Southgate doesn’t seem to have many other solutions beyond the trusty back-three comes good again, rather than finding a way to make a back four work

    Relying on a teenager with limited big tournament experience is a risk, but Southgate has little choice

    Even England’s set-pieces, such a potent weapon at the 2018 World Cup, aren’t working anymore

    So it feels a lot like Southgate’s side have become the football version of the nation’s cricket team in 1986

    So maybe, just maybe, it will be alright on the night in Qatar

    "The Sun", "Sun", "Sun Online" are registered trademarks or trade names of News Group Newspapers Limited

    ['england', 'three', 'southgate', 'play', 'game']

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/sports/2022/09/25/kenyas-kipchoge-shatters-marathon-world-record-in-berlin/30051

    09/25/2022

    42.86% Shortened!

    He gradually shook off last year’s winner Guye Adola but Ethiopian Andamlak Belihu refused to buckle, even as they raced through the halfway mark in less than an hour

    Belihu finally dropped back around the 27 kilometre-mark as Kipchoge pushed on for the record

    The Kenyan, who retained his Olympic at the Tokyo Games last year, had fallen short of his world mark by just over a minute at the Tokyo Marathon in March, but he was not to be denied in Berlin

    Fellow Kenyan Mark Korir completed a one-two finish for the African nation, four minutes and 49 seconds behind, with Ethiopian Tadu Abate third

    “There is a high possibility that I will train with Axelsen and Antonsen before the Denmark Open

    I had contacted them and we are currently finalising the details,” revealed Zii Jia after a training session at the Sports Arena Sentosa in Kuala Lumpur

    I have to work harder on maintaining my focus

    I also need to keep believing in myself,” said Zii Jia

    I would have played otherwise

    “Anyway, the team did well without me as they won the mixed team gold

    Ng Tze Yong also reached the singles final.” Looking forward, Zii Jia is eyeing more ranking points as he chases a spot in the season-ending World Tour Finals in Guangzhou from Dec 14-18

    I know I need to catch up after skipping the Malaysian Masters and Singapore Open in July

    “After Denmark, I will take part in the French Open (Oct 25-30) and most probably the Hylo Open (Germany, Nov 1-6) and the Australian Open (Nov 15-20),” said Zii Jia, whose ultimate goal is to do well at the 2024 Paris Olympic Games.

  • TZE YONG PREVAILS IN PRESSURE COOKER TO SMASH DOWN MEN'S SINGLES GOLD

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/badminton/2022/09/25/tze-yong-prevails-in-pressure-cooker-to-smash-down-mens-singles-gold

    09/25/2022

    56.0% Shortened!

    It was the first tournament that Tze Yong had competed in as the overwhelming favourite but the Johorean justified his top seeding when he came from behind to subdue Federal Territories’ Leong Jun Hao 18-21, 21-19, 21-12 in a thrilling 80-minute final at the Axiata Arena in Bukit Jalil

    The 22-year-old Tze Yong was glad to come through the match and credited Jun Hao for his battling display

    “I’m so happy and proud to win this gold for Johor

    Jun Hao played really well in the first two games,” said Tze Yong

    “He really pushed me hard and it was a 50-50 match

    That was the key to my win

    I faced a big test in whether I could handle the pressure as the top seed and I’m happy that I handled it well,” he added

    The International Challenge will be a warm-up for Tze Yong before the higher-tier Masters as he had chosen to skip the Vietnam Open, which starts on Tuesday

    “I hope to maintain my form in the next tournaments

    I’m not setting any specific targets in Indonesia but will keep focusing on one match at a time,” said Tze Yong, who is ranked 36th in the world

    Kai Wun then combined with Tan Kok Xian to beat Johor’s Lwi Sheng Hao-Yap Roy King 21-16, 21-17 in the men’s doubles

    ['tze', 'yong', 'jun', 'hao', 'men']

  • SEVEN MALAYSIAN EV-RELATED STOCKS TO LOOK OUT FOR

    https://www.thesundaily.my/business/seven-malaysian-ev-related-stocks-to-look-out-for-MM9871583

    09/25/2022

    59.26% Shortened!

    Malaysia has a strong input industry with many local companies playing a part in the global electric vehicle (EV) supply chain, such as semiconductors, battery assembly and copper wire manufacturing

    Despite a slow start and still lagging behind its Asian peers, Malaysia is on the right track on its auto industry transformation and the Malaysian EV industry is well placed to develop

    Its key technologies can be segregated into EV battery module assembly line and EV battery pack assembly line

    We opine that D&O is in a good position to capture the bigger demand from the electric vehicle industry as it manufactures smart LED’s for this sector

    Pentamaster Corp Bhd Similar to MPI, Pentamaster will benefit from the rising penetration of SiC in power management applications for EVs by capturing opportunities in the EV battery market

    The automated test equipment (ATE) provider expects higher demand for its assembly and test equipment due to rising orders from global automotive component companies in Europe, US and China

    As of 2021, the automotive industry continued dominated the ATE segment, contributing 44.6% of its revenue

    Moving forward, Pentamaster has set their eyes on its next global expansion towards Germany being a major market in the automotive industry

    Genetec Technology Bhd Genetec serves automotive-electric vehicle and internal combustion engine, hard disk drive, electronics, pharmaceutical, semiconductor, and home appliance industries

    KESM Industries Bhd KESM is the world’s largest independent burn-in and test service company

    The shift towards electric vehicles will create higher electronic content demand which will benefit the chip supplier company

    ['industry', 'vehicle', 'battery', 'technology', 'bhd']

    Malaysia has a strong input industry with many local companies playing a part in the global electric vehicle (EV) supply chain, such as semiconductors, battery assembly and copper wire manufacturing

    Despite a slow start and still lagging behind its Asian peers, Malaysia is on the right track on its auto industry transformation and the Malaysian EV industry is well placed to develop

    Its key technologies can be segregated into EV battery module assembly line and EV battery pack assembly line

    We opine that D&O is in a good position to capture the bigger demand from the electric vehicle industry as it manufactures smart LED’s for this sector

    Pentamaster Corp Bhd Similar to MPI, Pentamaster will benefit from the rising penetration of SiC in power management applications for EVs by capturing opportunities in the EV battery market

    The automated test equipment (ATE) provider expects higher demand for its assembly and test equipment due to rising orders from global automotive component companies in Europe, US and China

    As of 2021, the automotive industry continued dominated the ATE segment, contributing 44.6% of its revenue

    Moving forward, Pentamaster has set their eyes on its next global expansion towards Germany being a major market in the automotive industry

    Genetec Technology Bhd Genetec serves automotive-electric vehicle and internal combustion engine, hard disk drive, electronics, pharmaceutical, semiconductor, and home appliance industries

    KESM Industries Bhd KESM is the world’s largest independent burn-in and test service company

    The shift towards electric vehicles will create higher electronic content demand which will benefit the chip supplier company

    ['industry', 'vehicle', 'battery', 'technology', 'bhd']



  • MODEL WHO CRITICIZED MYANMAR'S MILITARY FEARS REPATRIATION; IN AIRPORT LIMBO

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/09/25/model-who-criticized-myanmar039s-military-fears-repatriation-in-airport-limbo

    09/25/2022

    66.67% Shortened!

    Thaw Nandar Aung, a model from Myanmar speaks to a reporter in Bangkok, Thailand on March 31, 2021

    The model, also known as Han Lay, from Myanmar who denounced her country’s military rulers last year from the stage of a beauty pageant in Thailand said Friday, Sept

    Thaw Nandar Aung, also known as Han Lay, told The Associated Press by phone that she has been stuck at Bangkok’s Suvarnabhumi Airport since being denied reentry to Thailand when she arrived Wednesday night from a short trip to Vietnam

    agency advised her she would be arrested in Vietnam and then repatriated to Myanmar

    Myanmar’s military seized power in February 2021 from the elected government of Aung San Suu Kyi and has cracked down heavily on widespread opposition to its rule

    - AFP Thaw Nandar Aung said she was charged in absentia in September last year under a section of Myanmar's Penal Code covering sedition for speaking out against the military takeover at the pageant and online

    On Thursday night, Thai police told her that Myanmar police had come to see her, but she declined to meet them, Thaw Nandar Aung said

    Thaw Nandar Aung used her platform as the Myanmar contestant at last year's Miss Grand International beauty pageant in the Thai capital, Bangkok, to speak about the killings of pro-democracy protesters in her homeland

    "In doing so, the leaders involved should not use their power and selfishness.” "Today in my country, Myanmar, while I am going to be on this stage, there are so many people dying, more than 100 people died today

    We need your urgent international help right now.” Thaw Nandar Aung said she was optimistic after meeting Friday with representatives of the U.N

    High Commissioner for Refugees' office that she would not be sent back to Myanmar

    ['thaw', 'nandar', 'aung', 'myanmar', 'thailand']

    Thaw Nandar Aung, a model from Myanmar speaks to a reporter in Bangkok, Thailand on March 31, 2021

    The model, also known as Han Lay, from Myanmar who denounced her country’s military rulers last year from the stage of a beauty pageant in Thailand said Friday, Sept

    Thaw Nandar Aung, also known as Han Lay, told The Associated Press by phone that she has been stuck at Bangkok’s Suvarnabhumi Airport since being denied reentry to Thailand when she arrived Wednesday night from a short trip to Vietnam

    agency advised her she would be arrested in Vietnam and then repatriated to Myanmar

    Myanmar’s military seized power in February 2021 from the elected government of Aung San Suu Kyi and has cracked down heavily on widespread opposition to its rule

    - AFP Thaw Nandar Aung said she was charged in absentia in September last year under a section of Myanmar's Penal Code covering sedition for speaking out against the military takeover at the pageant and online

    On Thursday night, Thai police told her that Myanmar police had come to see her, but she declined to meet them, Thaw Nandar Aung said

    Thaw Nandar Aung used her platform as the Myanmar contestant at last year's Miss Grand International beauty pageant in the Thai capital, Bangkok, to speak about the killings of pro-democracy protesters in her homeland

    "In doing so, the leaders involved should not use their power and selfishness.” "Today in my country, Myanmar, while I am going to be on this stage, there are so many people dying, more than 100 people died today

    We need your urgent international help right now.” Thaw Nandar Aung said she was optimistic after meeting Friday with representatives of the U.N

    High Commissioner for Refugees' office that she would not be sent back to Myanmar

  • ARSENAL-TOTTENHAM DERBY SMASHES WSL ATTENDANCE RECORD

    https://global.espn.com/football/arsenal-arsenal_women/story/4752955/arsenal-tottenham-derby-smashes-wsl-attendance-record

    09/24/2022, 23:34

    62.5% Shortened!

    ESPN FC's Sophie Lawson joins Mark Donaldson after Arsenal's 4-0 win over Tottenham in front of record WSL crowd of 47,367 at the Emirates

    A record crowd of 47,367 turned out to watch Arsenal thrash Spurs 4-0 thanks to a Vivianne Miedema brace and goals from Beth Mead and Rafaelle

    Ticket sales for Saturday's match had already surpassed that figure on Sept

    Arsenal also confirmed that 53,757 tickets were sold for Saturday's derby

    This follows a record-breaking Women's European Championship campaign that saw 87,192 fans packed into Wembley Stadium for England's victory in the final, setting a Euros attendance record

    "I hope this momentum can continue throughout the whole campaign and I encourage anyone to come along to a Barclays WSL match and be a part of this exciting league." Arsenal had sold over 50,000 tickets for the match before Saturday and Arsenal manager Jonas Eidevall said that he is keen to see attendances for women's matches continue to rise

    ['arsenal', 'record', 'emirate', 'woman', 'league']

    Ticket sales for Saturday's match had already surpassed that figure on Sept

    Arsenal also confirmed that 53,757 tickets were sold for Saturday's derby

    This follows a record-breaking Women's European Championship campaign that saw 87,192 fans packed into Wembley Stadium for England's victory in the final, setting a Euros attendance record

    "I hope this momentum can continue throughout the whole campaign and I encourage anyone to come along to a Barclays WSL match and be a part of this exciting league." Arsenal had sold over 50,000 tickets for the match before Saturday and Arsenal manager Jonas Eidevall said that he is keen to see attendances for women's matches continue to rise

  • ARAUJO JOINS KOUNDE ON INJURY LIST AS BARCELONA'S DEFENSIVE PROBLEMS GROW

    https://www.beinsports.com/us/soccer/video/araujo-joins-kounde-on-injury-list-as-barce-2/1956501

    09/24/2022

    42.86% Shortened!

    Barcelona have confirmed Ronald Araujo suffered a thigh injury while on international duty with Uruguay, adding to the Blaugrana's defensive problems after Jules Kounde sustained a hamstring injury

    Araujo was substituted just five minutes into Uruguay's 1-0 friendly loss to Iran in Austria on Friday, having pulled up less than a minute into the match.  Earlier on Friday, the French Football Federation announced Jules Kounde was to leave Didier Deschamps' squad after being replaced during their Nations League win over Austria on Thursday

    Barcelona have now revealed the nature of the duo's injuries, with Araujo suffering an avulsion fracture in his right thigh and Kounde having a biceps femoris injury in his left hamstring

    Losing both Araujo and Kounde for any significant period of time would be a major blow for Xavi, who has made the pair defensive mainstays in his new-look team

    ['barcelona', 'araujo', 'suffer', 'thigh', 'injury']

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/24/political-frogs-will-be-punished-by-voters-in-ge15-says-zahid

    09/24/2022, 18:30

    64.71% Shortened!

    Saturday, 24 Sep 2022

    The Umno president who was just acquitted of all 40 graft charges in the Foreign Visa System (VLN) case said for those who tried to belittle Umno and their leadership under Barisan Nasional, the coming general elections would prove the unity and mechanism that Umno has at the grassroots

    Ahmad Zahid then claimed that he was subjected to ridicule and negative labels, including attempts to topple him from the Umno presidency, when he was undergoing the trial

    "I am not afraid to defend the Umno despite various political threats," he said Ahmad Zahid then reiterated claims that his court case was politically motivated after he refused to heed calls by Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad to dissolve Umno when the latter was prime minister under Pakatan Harapan rule

    "I did not waver and the fact is, I still fight to defend Umno after being trusted by our grassroots all over the country to carry out my duties as president," he said

    On Friday (Sept 23), Ahmad Zahid was freed of all 40 graft charges in the VLN case after the prosecution failed to prove a prima facie case

  • SIPADAN ISLAND CORAL REEFS DAMAGED BY 900M TANGLED FISHING NET, BOAT OPERATOR DETAINED FOR QUESTIONING

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/24/sipadan-island-coral-reefs-damaged-by-900m-tangled-fishing-net-boat-operator-detained-for-questioning/29911

    09/24/2022, 16:32

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KOTA KINABALU, Sept 24 — Authorities yesterday had to remove a 900-metre fishing net that was found near a famous diving spot in Sipadan island, damaging some of its coral reefs

    The net, which had drifted away from a fishing boat, was caught on the famed Barracuda Point dive site and extended toward Hanging Gardens, with some 18 fishes caught in it, including two sharks

    Culture, Arts and Tourism Minister Datuk Jafry Arifin said that the net was sighted at about 6am yesterday by a Sabah Parks ranger and the dive marshal on duty when they saw the floating buoys of the net which had drifted

    “After calling in and reporting the matter, work began to remove the net with the help of several dive operators — Seahorse Scuba, Borneo Jungle and Dive Semporna

    “The mission took all day, to clear the net from Barracuda Point to North Point, but by night time, some 200m was left

    A wooden fishing boat had also approached the marine park yesterday morning around 9.40am, without a permit to enter, and claimed responsibility for the net which had drifted with the currents into the park

    ['yesterday', 'remove', 'fishing', 'net', 'dive']

    About Us Advertise KOTA KINABALU, Sept 24 — Authorities yesterday had to remove a 900-metre fishing net that was found near a famous diving spot in Sipadan island, damaging some of its coral reefs

    The net, which had drifted away from a fishing boat, was caught on the famed Barracuda Point dive site and extended toward Hanging Gardens, with some 18 fishes caught in it, including two sharks

    Culture, Arts and Tourism Minister Datuk Jafry Arifin said that the net was sighted at about 6am yesterday by a Sabah Parks ranger and the dive marshal on duty when they saw the floating buoys of the net which had drifted

    “After calling in and reporting the matter, work began to remove the net with the help of several dive operators — Seahorse Scuba, Borneo Jungle and Dive Semporna

    “The mission took all day, to clear the net from Barracuda Point to North Point, but by night time, some 200m was left

    A wooden fishing boat had also approached the marine park yesterday morning around 9.40am, without a permit to enter, and claimed responsibility for the net which had drifted with the currents into the park

    ['yesterday', 'remove', 'fishing', 'net', 'dive']

    I understand because of the result that is not going to be the reaction externally."

    The latter is finished in black on the Sport, while the Trend and Titanium’s horizontal accents are dressed in chrome

    As before, the Everest’s technical ability remains high

    Both the Sport and Titanium come with a hands-free powered tailgate

    As for driver assistance features, the Sport and Trend come equipped with emergency stop signal, turn assist, cruise control, front and rear parking sensors and a reverse camera

    No AWD unlike the Aussie version and last gen Everest

    ['car', 'ford', 'everest', 'sport', 'trend']



  • FORGOTTEN MANCHESTER UNITED MAN COULD BE ABOUT TO GIVE CRISTIANO RONALDO HIS NEXT CHALLENGE

    https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/manchester-united-cristiano-ronaldo-martial-25091849

    09/24/2022

    77.78% Shortened!

    Man United will be able to add another string to their bow once Anthony Martial has recovered from his current injury

    But on the one occasion Martial did get to try and start rekindling his United career, he ensured that he made his mark, providing an excellent assist for Marcus Rashford's first goal of the season in the 2-1 win over Liverpool last month

    United had found a front-three that complemented each other during pre-season and Martial's injury put pay to that being unleashed for Ten Hag's competitive debut in the United dugout

    It meant Ronaldo was restricted to starting on the bench again, with Ten Hag favouring a quick, fluid front-three with Rashford at the head of it

    Ronaldo, on the flip side, has only started once in the Premier League so far this season, with Ten Hag preferring Rashford as his centre-forward in the last four matches

    Ten Hag has shown he trusts Martial and he will be determined to repay him by making up for lost time

    ['united', 'martial', 'ten', 'hag', 'season']

  • 'FAT LEONARD' MAY BE VENEZUELA'S BARGAINING CHIP IN SEEKING US RECOGNITION, EXPERTS SAY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/24/039fat-leonard039-may-be-venezuela039s-bargaining-chip-in-seeking-us-recognition-experts-say

    09/24/2022, 15:49

    81.25% Shortened!

    But it is unclear how hard the US government will fight for the return of Leonard, the Malaysian owner of a ship-servicing company in South-East Asia who is the central character in one of the largest bribery scandals in Pentagon history

    Leonard had his first court appearance Thursday (Sept 22), according to a law enforcement official in Venezuela who spoke Friday (Sept 23) to the Associated Press on condition of anonymity because he was not authorised to discuss judicial proceedings

    Leonard is the mastermind of a huge bribery scheme that ensnared dozens of Navy officials

    Still, Smilde said he wouldn't be surprised to see Leonard pop up in a Venezuelan-government produced confession video hinting that he has more salacious details

    Neither US nor Venezuelan officials have released details about how Leonard spent his time on the run or what he planned to do in Russia, but his travels to three countries in a period of two weeks indicate he had access to money and other help

    Jason Forge, a former federal prosecutor in San Diego involved in high-profile extradition cases out of Mexico, said Leonard may try to convince Venezuela that he's got something to offer, but Forge doubts he truly does

    ['leonard', 'fat', 'navy', 'also', 'read']

    Yaya believes that Nigeria can learn from Malaysia’s multi-racial and multi-religion harmony

    What has nasi lemak got to do with Nigeria, English Premier League (EPL) and the European football governing body UEFA? A Nigerian man, Oluwashola Yaya Olukosi, or Yaya, sells nasi lemak at the University of Malaya (UM), and he is popular among UM students and staff

    Having been in Malaysia since 2010, he has worked with Nasi Lemak Tanglin for more than eight years

    Yaya can speak Malay fluently

    He was a coach for the under-12 and 13-year-old teams at Wolverhampton when he was in the United Kingdom

    Yaya also continued his studies at Salford City College, Manchester, in football coaching

  • MAN WHO KILLED STRAY DOG WITH ARROW MUST BE CAUGHT, SAY ANIMAL RIGHTS GROUPS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/24/man-who-killed-stray-dog-with-arrow-must-be-caught-say-animal-rights-groups

    09/24/2022, 14:08

    73.91% Shortened!

    “According to the video, the suspect had trailed the stray dog with his bow and arrow

    The suspect did not waste any time to shoot down the poor dog when he got the chance,” the group said in a Facebook post

    The dog died with the arrow pierced through its face,” it added

    The group said that it does not believe that the dog attacked the suspect

    Please do archery at an appropriate place! If you see animals being a victim to such deeds, please save the animal and put an end to such cruelty,” it said

    A post shared by Malaysian Animal Organization (@animal.org.my)

    ['video', 'stray', 'dog', 'arrow', 'animal']

    Currently, individuals who test positive for Covid-19 are required to undergo seven days of home quarantine, but they are allowed to be released if they test negative on the fourth day

    If they test negative on the fourth day, they can be released

    When asked about dishonesty among workers who claim they are Covid-19 positive to avoid coming to work, Khairy said this was not a huge concern in Malaysia

    "Whether we are truthful or not in our Covid-19 reporting is a matter of integrity," said Khairy
